text: A lightweight TypeScript SDK designed to simplify Solana blockchain interactions.
Features include: wallet connection management, transaction signing, SPL token operations, and reduced boilerplate code for DApp development.
Published on npm and actively maintained with focus on developer experience and reliability.

projects.title: Solana DApp
projects.description: A TypeScript web app that demonstrates how to interact with the Solana blockchain directly from the browser.

text: A demonstration TypeScript web application showcasing direct Solana blockchain interactions in the browser.
Implements wallet integration, token transfers, and transaction history display.
Serves as both a functional DApp and educational resource for Solana development.
